line.tr: Küni Tеrеg: üč yašïmda: qansïz boldum
line.ru: [Мое имя] - Кюни Тирег. В три года остался без отца.
line.en: (I am) Küni Tereg. I lost my father when I was three years old.
My grandfather Külüg Tutuq made me a man.
I was a man without sorrow.

line.ru: С женой у очага, и с дедом я разлучился.
line.en: I parted from my wife at hearth and grandfather.
